snippet: Said D. Amirov, the mayor of Dagestan’s capital, was detained in connection with the 2011 killing of a senior state investigator.
abstract: Said D Amirov, mayor of Makhachkala, Dagestan, one of Russia’s most violent cities, is arrested and detained in connection with 2011 killing of a senior state investigator.
lead_paragraph: Said D. Amirov, the mayor of Dagestan’s capital, was detained in connection with the 2011 killing of a senior state investigator.

headline.seo: Russian Forces Detain Mayor In Dagestan
headline.main: Russian Force Arrests Mayor Tied to Killing in Dagestan
headline.print_headline: Russian Force Arrests Mayor Tied to Killing In Dagestan
